## The required paper is not open source, how do I access it?

Via our shared [Zotero library](https://www.zotero.org/groups/6113424/pubh-/library). If you don't have access, please email [chiraaggohel@gwu.edu](mailto:chiraaggohel@gwu.edu) to be added.
